name: Box Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Box events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Box Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Box events occur

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events to listen to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Collaboration Accepted (值: COLLABORATION.ACCEPTED) - A collaboration has been accepted
Collaboration Created (值: COLLABORATION.CREATED) - A collaboration is created
Collaboration Rejected (值: COLLABORATION.REJECTED) - A collaboration has been rejected
Collaboration Removed (值: COLLABORATION.REMOVED) - A collaboration has been removed
Collaboration Updated (值: COLLABORATION.UPDATED) - A collaboration has been updated
Comment Created (值: COMMENT.CREATED) - A comment object is created
Comment Deleted (值: COMMENT.DELETED) - A comment object is removed
Comment Updated (值: COMMENT.UPDATED) - A comment object is edited
File Copied (值: FILE.COPIED) - A file is copied
File Deleted (值: FILE.DELETED) - A file is moved to the trash
File Downloaded (值: FILE.DOWNLOADED) - A file is downloaded
File Locked (值: FILE.LOCKED) - A file is locked
File Moved (值: FILE.MOVED) - A file is moved from one folder to another
File Previewed (值: FILE.PREVIEWED) - A file is previewed
File Renamed (值: FILE.RENAMED) - A file was renamed
File Restored (值: FILE.RESTORED) - A file is restored from the trash
File Trashed (值: FILE.TRASHED) - A file is moved to the trash
File Unlocked (值: FILE.UNLOCKED) - A file is unlocked
File Uploaded (值: FILE.UPLOADED) - A file is uploaded to or moved to this folder
Folder Copied (值: FOLDER.COPIED) - A copy of a folder is made
Folder Created (值: FOLDER.CREATED) - A folder is created
Folder Deleted (值: FOLDER.DELETED) - A folder is permanently removed
Folder Downloaded (值: FOLDER.DOWNLOADED) - A folder is downloaded
Folder Moved (值: FOLDER.MOVED) - A folder is moved to a different folder
Folder Renamed (值: FOLDER.RENAMED) - A folder was renamed
Folder Restored (值: FOLDER.RESTORED) - A folder is restored from the trash
Folder Trashed (值: FOLDER.TRASHED) - A folder is moved to the trash
Metadata Instance Created (值: METADATA_INSTANCE.CREATED) - A new metadata template instance is associated with a file or folder
Metadata Instance Deleted (值: METADATA_INSTANCE.DELETED) - An existing metadata template instance associated with a file or folder is deleted
Metadata Instance Updated (值: METADATA_INSTANCE.UPDATED) - An attribute (value) is updated/deleted for an existing metadata template instance associated with a file or folder
Sharedlink Created (值: SHARED_LINK.CREATED) - A shared link was created
Sharedlink Deleted (值: SHARED_LINK.DELETED) - A shared link was deleted
Sharedlink Updated (值: SHARED_LINK.UPDATED) - A shared link was updated
Task Assignment Created (值: TASK_ASSIGNMENT.CREATED) - A task is created
Task Assignment Updated (值: TASK_ASSIGNMENT.UPDATED) - A task is updated
Webhook Deleted (值: WEBHOOK.DELETED) - When a webhook is deleted

targetType.name: targetType
targetType.description: The type of item to trigger a webhook
targetType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Type | 作用: The type of item to trigger a webhook
available_options: File (值: file)
Folder (值: folder)

targetId.name: targetId
targetId.description: The ID of the item to trigger a webhook
targetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target ID | 作用: The ID of the item to trigger a webhook
